clues.text: Let's drop the proverbial one: 1,000, 1, 100

Take it easy:
1,001, 50, 500

To combine:
1,000, 9

Do your duty:
101, 5, 1, 100

Stay sharp!
6, 5, 1, 500

rounds.text: Squashing the allegory theory, the daughters of the author of this novel say it's "just a story about rabbits"
